item.title: Doubling Your Battery Life
item.description: How I “doubled” my battery life Most Android OEMs come bundled with a TON of bloatware. For example, I don’t use most of the google suite so I tend to delete almost all of the google apps that come pre-installed with my device. Some Background I use a Samsung Galaxy S23 as my main device, so on top of coming in with some of the google apps such as their frankly awful browser and assistant I only ever used for music recognition, it also came in with a bunch of Samsung bloatware such as Bixby, the “modes & routines” which require WAY too many permissions for me to trust, I ended up trying some of the features and realizing that I, personally, could live without them.
